onboarding.locationDescription: La wadaag goobtaada si aad u hesho saadaal cimilada sax ah iyo talo beeralayda oo gobolkaaga ku habboon.

benefits.regionAdvice: Talo dalagga oo gobolkaaga ku habboon

onboarding.languageSubtitle: Dooro luqada aad jeceshahay ee kaaliyaha

settings.chatHistorySubtitle: Arag oo sii wad wada-hadalladii hore
settings.aiServicesSubtitle: Arag adeegyada AI ee gobolkaaga ka shaqaynaya

settings.tapToUpdateLocation: Taabo si aad u cusboonaysiiso goobta

mcp.title: Adeegyada AI
mcp.footer: Adeeggu wuxuu ku xiran yahay goobtaada
mcp.couldNotLoadDetails: Faahfaahinta adeegga lama soo rari karin
mcp.servicesAvailable: {active} ka mid ah {total} adeeg ayaa laga helaa goobtaada

agrivision.name: AgriVision
agrivision.tagline: Aqoonsiga cudurrada dhirta ee AI ku shaqeeya
agrivision.description: Falanqee sawirrada dhirta si aad u aqoonsato cudurrada, cayayaanka, iyo nafaqo-darada. Hel baadhitaan degdeg ah oo ay la socdaan talooyin daawayn iyo ka hortag.

isdaSoil.name: ISDA Soil
isdaSoil.tagline: Tilmaamaha ciidda iyo falanqaynta nafaqada ee Afrika
isdaSoil.description: Hel macluumaad faahfaahsan oo ciidda ah oo ay ku jiraan pH, nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium, iyo nafaqooyin kale. Waxaa laga helaa dhammaan Afrika oo leh xallin 30 mitir ah.

accuweather.name: AccuWeather
accuweather.tagline: Xaaladaha hadda iyo saadaasha cimilada adduunka
accuweather.description: Hel xogta cimilada waqtiga dhabta ah sida heerkulka, qoyaanka, dabaysha, iyo roobka. Saadaasha waxaa laga heli karaa ilaa 15 maalmood.

gapWeather.name: GAP Weather
gapWeather.description: Saadaal gaar ah oo cimilada beeraha ee Kenya. Waxaa ku jira uumi-bax, shucaaca qorraxda, iyo saadaasha roobka oo loogu talagalay go'aamada beeraha.

edacap.name: EDACaP Climate
edacap.description: Saadaasha cimilada xilliyeed oo ay ku jiraan saadaasha heerkulka iyo roobka. Waxay ka caawisaa beeralayda inay qorsheeyaan beerashada iyo goosashada.

weatherapi.name: WeatherAPI
weatherapi.tagline: Xogta cimilada ee goobaha caalamiga ah
weatherapi.description: Adeeg xog cimilada oo dhammaystiran oo bixiya xaaladaha hadda iyo saadaasha meelaha adduunka oo dhan.

tomorrowIo.name: Tomorrow.io
tomorrowIo.description: Madal horumarsan oo xogta cimilada ah oo leh saadaalo xallin sare leh iyo awoodo saadaal degdeg ah.

feedFormulation.name: Feed Formulation
feedFormulation.tagline: Xisaabinta quudinta ugu fiican ee lo'da caanaha
feedFormulation.description: Xisaabi isku-darka quudinta ugu qiimaha yar ee lo'daada caanaha. Waxay tixgelisaa bartilmaameedyada caanaha, miisaanka, iyo quudinta maxalliga ah.

nextgen.name: NextGen Fertilizer
nextgen.tagline: Talooyinka bacriminta gaarka ah ee goobta ee Itoobiya
nextgen.description: Hel talooyinka bacriminta saxda ah ee ku salaysan goobtaada. Waxaa ku jira bacriminta dabiiciga ah (compost, vermicompost) iyo kuwa aan dabiiciga ahayn (Urea, NPS).

decisionTree.name: Crop Decision Tree
decisionTree.description: Hel talooyinka maaraynta dalagyada ee ku salaysan marxaladda koritaanka iyo cimilada hadda. Waxay kaa caawineysaa inaad go'aanno waqtigooda ah ka gaarto xakamaynta cayayaanka, waraabka, iyo goosashada.

gapAgriculture.name: GAP Agriculture
gapAgriculture.description: Adeegyada talo-siinta beeraha guud ee maaraynta dalagyada iyo xoolaha.

system.errorFallback: Cilad lama filaan ah baa dhacday
system.restartRequired: App-ka Dib U Furid ayaa Loo Baahan Yahay
system.restartRequiredMessage: Ku wareejinta {language} waxay u baahan tahay in app-ka dib loo furo si ay isbeddelada qaabka u shaqeeyaan.
system.pleaseRestartMessage: Fadlan xidh oo dib u fur app-ka si isbeddelada ay u shaqeeyaan.

errors.syncFailed: Lama xiriirin server-ka. Qaar ka mid ah shaqooyinka ayaa xadidan.
errors.weatherUnavailable: Adeegga cimilada lama heli karo. Mar dambe isku day.
errors.diagnosisTimeout: Baadhitaanka dhirta wuu dheeraaday. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
errors.uploadFailed: Sawirka lama gelin. Hubi xiriirkaaga oo mar kale isku day.
errors.transcriptionFailed: Beddelidda codka ayaa guuldarraysatay. Mar kale ku hadal.
errors.serverError: Khalad server-ka ah. Fadlan mar dambe isku day.
errors.locationLookupFailed: Lama go'aamin karin meesha aad joogto.
errors.imageUploadFailed: Sawirka lama kaydin karin. Fariintaada waa la diray.
errors.mcpServersFailed: Ma shaqayn karaan adeegyada AI. Qaar ka mid ah shaqooyinka ayaa laga yaabaa inaysan diyaar ahayn.
errors.sessionCreateFailed: Wada-hadalka lama kaydin karin. Fariimaha laga yaabaa inaysan sii jirin.
